documentHeader.documentDescription: Generic device profile for open dnp3 slave stack

capabilities.notableAddition: More objects than the basic Level 2. See the Implementation Table for details.

currentValue.note: The device supports up to 3 (configurable) serial ports

capabilities.note: Configurable for Parity Bits (NONE, EVEN, ODD) and for Stop Bits (1, 1.5 and 2). Actual support depends on deployed OS and HW
